text: Marcia Carolyn "Marcy" Kaptur (born June 17, 1946) is an American politician. He is the U.S. Representative representing Ohio. She has served since 1983. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Kaptur endorsed Bernie Sanders for Democratic nomination in 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur official U.S. House site *Marcy Kaptur for Congress * * * *Profile at SourceWatch *Jake Whitney interviews Marcy Kaptur in Guernica magazine, December 2009 Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Toledo, Ohio Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Urban planners Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Marcy Kaptur
